duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing nursing care to medical-surgical patients with a focus on Orthopedic, Orthopedic Trauma, Spine, and Gynecological patients.
Maintaining patient and staff satisfaction through teamwork, shared governance, and commitment to quality.
Adhering to the accreditation standards of a Total Joint Center of Excellence.
Care for patients with total joint replacements (hip and knee), extremity fractures/surgeries, back injuries/surgeries, hysterectomies, and other gynecologic surgeries.
Providing care for a variety of other medical diagnoses as needed.

education_certification.credential: BLS Certification from the American Heart Association
